name: PostTicketReplyFreshservice
description:
Post a new reply on a Freshservice ticket.

Use this tool to add a reply to a specific ticket in Freshservice. Call it when you need to respond or add information to an existing ticket.

parameters.name: ticket_id_for_reply
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the Freshservice ticket to which the reply should be posted.

value_schema.description: ID of ticket for which reply has to be created

parameters.name: reply_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the reply, including user and ticket IDs, timestamps, email addresses, reply body, and attachments.

user_id.description: Unique ID of the user who created the reply

created_at.description: Timestamp at which the note is created

updated_at.description: Timestamp at which the note is updated

body.description: The body of the note in HTML format.

body_text.description: The body of the note in plain text format

ticket_id.description: Unique ID of the ticket to which the reply belongs

to_emails.description: Addresses to which the conversation must be sent

cc_emails.description: Addresses which must be copied on while sending the conversation

bcc_emails.description: Addresses to which a blind copy must be sent

value_schema.description: details of the Reply to be posted

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: ticket_id
parameters.description: ID of ticket for which reply has to be created

value_schema.description: ID of ticket for which reply has to be created

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: details of the Reply to be posted
